browser: add compatibility reflection for pre-Android-2.1 devices
comments: fix click thumbnail; hide thumbnail for selfposts

xml: add some content descriptions for upvote/downvote arrows

#139: enlarge thumbnail clickable height

Does not take up entire ListItem height but it is taller than before
The trouble is it needs a fixed width so its xml element
is listed before the thread Title element,
but its height depends on Title element height.
cannot have both as far as I know.
#157: fire Intent to view market.android.com URIs

specifically for the URLs associated with each post
comments: fix: do not show thumbnail within self post
#139: enlarged thumbnail all the way!

#221: notifyDataSetChanged() to immediately reflect click

#221: factor out ThingInfo.setClicked() and notifyDataSetChanged()

#197: fix async thumbnail loading for threads

* fix a bug that was not using the bitmap cache!
* only update thumbnail if the thread position is on screen.
otherwise you probably get a stale (recycled) view reference
